author: Shaik Yaqoob
headline: US IT Recruitment Lead | Talent Acquisition Expert | Connecting Top Tech Talent with Opportunities I Placement Specialist
text:
🚀 Job Title: Bench Sales Recruiter
📍 Location: Noida (Remote)
🕒 Experience: 3+ Years 

🌟 About the Role
We are looking for highly motivated and results-driven Bench Sales Recruiters to join our growing US Staffing team in Noida. The ideal candidate will have strong experience in marketing consultants on bench, excellent communication skills, and proven success working with US clients, vendors, and implementation partners.


🔹 Bench Sales Recruiter – 3+ Years Experience
Key Responsibilities:
Market IT consultants (W2 & C2C) on bench to US clients and vendors.
Work closely with recruiters to understand consultant skills, availability, and preferences.
Submit profiles to job portals, prime vendors, MSPs, and direct clients.
Negotiate bill rates and close placements efficiently.
Maintain strong relationships with vendors, clients, and implementation partners.
Track submissions, interviews, feedback, and placements.
Ensure compliance with documentation (H1B, OPT, GC, USC).
Required Skills:
3+ years of experience in US Bench Sales / IT Staffing.
Strong understanding of US hiring processes and tax terms (W2, C2C, 1099).
Hands-on experience with job portals like Dice, Monster, CareerBuilder, etc.
Excellent communication, negotiation, and follow-up skills.
Ability to work in a fast-paced, target-driven environment.
💼 What We Offer:
Competitive salary + highly attractive incentives
Growth-oriented environment with leadership opportunities
Exposure to top US clients and long-term projects
Supportive team culture and performance-based rewards

Please share me the Updated resume to below Emails
ID : greg@acodeinfosystems.net
 vasu35426@gmail.com

author: Aiman SEO Strategist
headline: Helping Businesses Rank Higher on Google & Turn Clicks into Clients | Expert in Keyword Strategy, On-Page SEO & High-Quality Content | Passionate About Digital Visibility
text:
Fake “We’re Hiring” posts need to stop.

Every time someone posts “We are hiring, hundreds of people apply with hope.
 Resumes. Comments. Messages. Prayers.

Most never hear back.
 No reply. No update. No closure.

A few days later, the same post appears again.
 Same words. Same false hope.
This isn’t networking.
 This isn’t branding.
 This is playing with the emotions of unemployed and struggling people, just for reach, likes, and visibility.

Job seekers are not engagement tools.
 Their hopes are not content.

If you’re not genuinely hiring, please don’t post that you are.
 A little honesty costs nothing.

 False hope costs someone’s peace.
Just something I felt needed to be said.

hashtag
#HiringEthics

#JobSeekers 
hashtag
#CareerTransparency

text:

Manniger IT Solutions – Gachibowli, Hyderabad

🔎 Open Positions

OPT Recruiter

author: Janet Williams
headline: 🔹 Talent Strategist | 💼 Recruiting Top Professionals | 🌍 Remote Opportunities | 🚀 Career Advancement | 🤝 Building High-Performing Teams | 💡 Professional Growth
text:
As a recruiter, I meet incredible talent every day — individuals with valuable experience, strong work ethic, and the drive to grow. Yet I also see how challenging the current job market can be, especially for those actively searching.
🌱 Here’s how I can support you:
• I review profiles weekly and share opportunities that match your skills
• I provide CV & LinkedIn tips to improve your visibility
• I connect job seekers with hiring teams when the right role appears
📌 If you’re 
hashtag
#opentowork, feel free to connect or drop your profile link in the comments — I’ll do my best to engage, keep you in mind, and share opportunities when they align with your background.
Let’s build a community where opportunities find people — not the other way around.
Your next role might be closer than you think. 🤝
